attributes.action: introduce legislation that gives all maufacturers and retailers 2 years to introduce recyclable packaging on ALL products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recycling is a nightmare for householders and councils. What plastic can be recycled and what cannot. What paper is recyclable and what is not. In 2 years time all packaging MUST be recylcable or heavy fines should be payable or refusal to accept goods at our ports. This must be so easy to introduce.
